name: Application Profile Report
description: Comprehensive application profile analysis and documentation

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content: This report provides a comprehensive analysis of {application_name}, a {application_category} application owned by {application_owner} within {organization_name}. The application serves critical business functions in the {application_area} domain and maintains {application_status} status with {application_tier} tier classification.

sections.title: Technical Architecture
sections.content: The technical architecture of {application_name} is designed to support {capabilities} within the organization's infrastructure. The system integrates with {dependencies} and operates as a {application_tier} tier application with established integration points: {integration_points}.

sections.title: Dependencies
sections.content: System dependencies for {application_name} include strategic integrations with external systems and services. The application maintains connections to {dependency_list} which are essential for operational functionality and data exchange within {organization_name}'s technology ecosystem.

sections.title: Context Model
sections.content: Operating within {organization_name}'s technology landscape, {application_name} serves as a key component in the {application_area} domain. {context_information} The application supports business operations through established workflows and user interfaces managed by {business_owner}.

sections.title: Footprint
sections.content: The financial and operational footprint of {application_name} includes total cost of ownership of {tco}, with capital expenditure of {capex} and operational expenses of {opex}. The application is supported by {vendor} with licensing arrangements including {license_info}.

sections.title: Capability Automation
sections.content: Automation capabilities within {application_name} streamline business processes and reduce manual intervention. The system provides {capabilities} and supports operational efficiency through automated workflows and integration with {dependencies}.

sections.title: Recommendations
sections.content: Based on the comprehensive analysis of {application_name}, the following strategic recommendations are proposed: {recommendations}. These recommendations focus on optimizing performance, managing costs, and ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.
